verbose_text: The NLRP3 inflammasome triggers the transformation of procaspase-1 into caspase-1, and converts proIL-1beta and proIL-18 into mature IL-1beta and IL-18; these proteins are then secreted outside the cell and lead to the inflammatory immune cascade XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: NLRP3 inflammasome triggers the transformation of procaspase-1 into caspase-1
